message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, even though I know you have other options.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate you countering and finding a middle ground is definitely something I'm open to. How about we settle on $12,800?  This reflects my willingness to be flexible while ensuring the deal is fair for both of us.
Alice, thank you for your flexibility. I understand your position, but I would like to keep the price closer to what I initially offered. How about we aim for $12,500?
